is_extension_mass_deployed.title: Dashlane installed through mass deployment
is_extension_mass_deployed.description: Property indicating whether the device is part of a mass deployment in an enterprise environment.

team_key.title: Key associated to a team
team_key.description: Property that indicates a key used to retrieve team info at creation account

silent_deploy.title: Silent Deployement
silent_deploy.description: Determine if we should open a tab at first login

MassDeployedTeamKey.title: Mass Deployed Team Key
MassDeployedTeamKey.description: Property that indicates a key used to send activity logs while logged out

Username.title: Username
Username.description: Property that indicates the username of the employee using the device
